method.name: logsink
method.shortdescription: Construct a logsink tool

param.name: enable_telemetry
param.description: Allow telemetry data to be written.

method.name: origin
method.shortdescription: Set the origin of the message
method.description: Sets the origin of messages to be displayed

param.name: fromwhere
param.description: The origin of a log messages

method.name: processorOrigin
method.shortdescription: Set the CASA processor origin
method.description: Sets the CASA processor origin which is shown at the end of each log origin

method.name: filter
method.shortdescription: Set the filter level
method.description: Set the filter level of logging messages to be displayed. This will determine what log messages go into the log file. The logger itself can adjust what gets displayed so you could set INFO5 and then filter in the logger everything above INFO1.

param.name: level
param.description: Level of messages to display to the console/log file

method.name: filterMsg
method.shortdescription: Add messages to the filter out list
method.description: Add messages to the filter out list

param.name: msgList
param.description: Array of strings identifying messages to filter out

method.name: clearFilterMsgList
method.shortdescription: Clear list of messages to be filter out
method.description: Clear list of messages to be filter out

method.name: post
method.shortdescription: Post a message
method.description: If the message passes the filter, write it (same as postLocally)

param.name: priority
param.description: Priority of message to be posted

param.name: origin
param.description: Origin of message to be posted

method.name: poststat
method.shortdescription: Post a message

param.name: origin
param.description: Origin of message to be posted

method.name: postLocally
method.shortdescription: Post locally
method.description: If the message passes the filter, write it

param.name: priority
param.description: Priority of message to be posted

param.name: origin
param.description: Origin of message to be posted
